即係咁，盲反定盲撐我都唔鍾意。

入正題之前講講華法林(warfarin)先
乜野係華法林？

如果你屋企有老人家要食薄血藥，我諗你多少都見過佢；甚至你屋企有好多米奇老鼠，你又要買老鼠藥，我諗你都會好奇過佢嘅成份。

屌你咁講我屋企人咪一直食緊老鼠藥？

理論上係———　屌我之前，你有冇考慮過以下幾樣野？

１　人同老鼠個身體構造唔同，個pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamic都唔會係一樣。即係話隻藥老鼠食完有幾多變左屎有幾多個身體食曬係同人類唔一樣。

＊題外話，所以有啲藥係pregnancy category排B未必一定係安全過排C。點解？我地睇一睇FDA點講

“Category B Animal reproduction studies have failed to demonstrate a risk to the fetus and there are no adequate and well-controlled studies in pregnant women.”

“Category C Animal reproduction studies have shown an adverse effect on the fetus and there are no adequate and well-controlled studies in humans, but potential benefits may warrant use of the drug in pregnant women despite potential risks.”

因為唔夠資料比較囉。

２　華法林係有Chiral centre（上圖粒＊），S-isomer 比 R-isomer 高3-5倍potency，即係話除左入面有幾多有效成份，隻藥仲要考慮埋隻enantiomerism。



３　有冇考慮過個劑量係幾多？



The dose makes the poison. — Paracelsus

冇錯，又係呢條友。呢條1493年出世ge肥佬曾經講過劑量決定係咪毒品。可能你會話，挑，都成五百幾年歷史，鳩up啦。哈，不過佢又真係冇錯曬。我舉幾個例子出黎：

MDMA 最近都有人討論佢係social phobia 嘅 藥用價值



“…In accordance with the reported effects of recreational ecstasy use, MDMA administration in the laboratory leads to dose-related increases in euphoria, extroversion, mood changes (enhanced mood or anxiety, depending on the dose and other factors), and mental confusion….”

Dexamfetamine 用黎醫ADHD



“…Dextroamphetamine immediate-release has a short half-life of 4–6 hours and requires multiple dosages two or three times a day. Therefore, it may be considered a second-line agent for adults with ADHD. …”
你要知道上面果兩隻野亂咁食，overdosed左，你會好high，隨時升埋天都有。

順帶一提，隊草班友經常話大麻係好野都錯唔曬，其中D9-THC用黎醫神經痛。



“…Clinical trials of CBs in multiple sclerosis have suggested a benefit in neuropathic pain. However, human studies of CB-mediated analgesia have been limited by study size, heterogeneous patient populations, and subjective outcome measures. Furthermore, CBs have variable pharmacokinetics and can manifest psychotropism.”

斯達丁話就降低低密度膽固醇，但係個劑量越高就越易有橫紋肌溶解症

“…The results of our adverse drug analysis suggest a dose-response relationship. Given the widespread use of statins, the ability to predict which patients will experience serious muscle-related harm is a research priority….”

“Rhabdomyolysis is a rare but clinically important adverse event that can occur as a result of statin use, either alone or, in particular, in combination with drugs that increase the potency of the statin. …”

４　Narrow therapeutic window



換言之個劑量越少就越易中風，劑量越大就越易流血不止，所以要MON住隻藥要係INR 2.0 - 3.0 嘅中間。

乜野係INR？

“An INR test measures the time for your blood to clot. It is also known as prothrombin time, or PT. It is used to monitor blood-thinning treatment, which are also known as anticoagulants. The INR, or international normalised ratio, can also be used to check if you have a blood clotting problem.”

所以話個有效成份雖然可以就用黎做老鼠藥，但係跟進醫生指引咁用底下一樣可以用黎薄血（當然唔係叫你貪平食老鼠藥啦，差好大！）。

明（好似係），如果醫生教住咁食係冇問題，咁不如講下華法林點薄血啦



大佬，我又唔係讀化學，點睇啊？

拿好簡單，你要知道凝血係有好多凝血因子，而其中就需要用到VKOR同維他命K去活化呢班友。華法林就抑制住VKOR，所以堆凝血因子活化唔到自然個凝血時間就會延長。


如果食緊華法林有啲乜野要注意

基因考慮VKORC1 CYP2C9
　　　　— 呢樣我唔講你可以自己諗下，如果CYP 2C9 （一種用黎代謝華法林ＧＥ酵素）同埋VKOR 呢舊receptor出現左問題，對凝血有咩影響？

隻藥會同乜野撞？ –

１　藥撞藥

Aspirin, azoles, cholestyramine 去到 NSAIDs, ritonavir, statins… A – V係好多藥都會撞，而且撞完個outcomes又未必一樣。

好似cholestyramine

“Cholestyramine and colestipol bind bile acids and prevent their absorption in the digestive tract,[19] but they can also bind other drugs, especially acidic drugs (e.g., warfarin, acetyl salicylic acid, sulfonamides, phenytoin, and furosemide)…”

同NSAIDs

“All NSAIDs can prolong bleeding time by inhibiting platelet function. High-dose aspirin has a direct hypoprothrombinemic effect. Phenylbutazone and its analogs enhance the hypoprothrombinemic effect of warfarin through a pharmacokinetic interaction by inhibiting the hepatic metabolism of warfarin”

２　藥撞病

甲狀腺同肝問題

“Hyperthyroid and hypothyroid states alter warfarin efficacy. Hyperthyroidism is associated with an increased sensitivity to oral anticoagulants. The mechanism may be that thyroxine increases the affinity of warfarin for receptor sites in the liver, leading to decreased production of clotting factors. Another mechanism may be increased catabolism of vitamin K–dependent clotting factors. In hypothyroid states, decreased catabolism of vitamin K–dependent clotting factors is believed to cause the decreased response to oral anticoagulants.”

“The liver is the principal site of synthesis of plasma proteins and clotting factors. A severe coagulation defect and an exaggerated response to warfarin has been documented in patients with liver failure. A retrospective study of predictors of major bleeding in hospitalized patients receiving warfarin revealed that bleeding episodes correlated with evidence of worsening liver function. Another study found that the presence of alcoholism and severe liver disease was a probable cause of a high International Normalized Ratio.”

３　藥撞食物

不過要記住佢話係食左大量呢類菜先會咁。

“Some vegetables (broccoli, Brussels sprouts, kale, parsley, spinach, and others) are high in vitamin K. Eating large quantities or making sudden changes in the amounts eaten of these vegetables, interferes with the effectiveness and safety of warfarin therapy.”

４　藥撞補品

葡萄糖胺

“…We located one published case report of concomitant use of glucosamine-chondroitin sulfate potentiating the effect of warfarin. In aggregate, the reports from the FDA and WHO, the published case report, and our case report suggest that the use of warfarin and glucosamine may lead to an increased INR….”

你要記住一點，有啲情況就算撞左都未必危險，但係乜都唔知情況就撞就好難講。

咁華法林關中醫咩事？

如果你有細心咁睇上一個post,我份海報有寫到ephedrine content個upper &lower limit都幾大，30-90% mainly in stem. 仲未計有乜野chemical properties要考慮。當然咁講係好武斷，但係都唔可以否認到Dosing仲係一個問題。

如果你唔明個問題係邊，一粒含500mg acetaminophen 嘅 panadol大約重0.7g同用一舊100g麵包包實住0.7g 藥丸，而家只係食入面果20g，咁樣實際嘅有效成份係dilute左，當然呢個只係其中一個scenario。

• 有冇考慮過個病人pharmacokinetics 係點? 好似唐氏綜合症除左係智能上嘅問題，新陳代謝都會被多左條嘅染色體影響。咁樣係咪隻隻中藥都食得？
你要知道要繼續list我仲有大把野講。

咁你點睇中醫



中醫係有研究價值，但係係未畀人用數據研究之前，我掂都唔會掂。好似你唔會買石油黎保濕一樣。

就算係補品果堆啊（例如葡萄糖胺），即使有systematic review去睇佢個efficacy，你睇返最新果份總會同之前果堆有出入。咁係咪唔食得？

當然好睇幾樣野，有冇撞藥（可以睇返如果食緊華法林有Ｄ乜野要注意），side effect profile 等等嘅 parameters保障你食完唔會出事。畢竟就算係placebo，你都唔可以否認placebo有果個效果（短時間係OK, 長期就咪搞）。

除此之外，你唔會靠葡萄糖胺去止痛就算架嘛。正如人地食NSAIDs去止痛亦都會食DMARDs (Disease-modifying antirheumatic drugs) 去拖慢個病情。如果個病人食完係Feel到OK，會唔會去停其他藥都係一個問題，話曬西藥副作用對病人黎講都係一個burden。
